pages.text: $(italic)The pure energy of gemstones in liquid form. It is said to have a healing effect.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Combining it with various other liquids results in all kinds of interesting looking materials.
Letting Liquid Crystal collide with Mud created Clay! Surely there are more combinations to discover!$(br2)$(italic)Thomas had never seen such unbalance before.$()
Letting a full block of Liquid Crystal absorb the immense heat of Lava resulted in this.$(br)Almost feels like a Magma Block, albeit way hotter.
As Water tried to flow into a full block of Liquid Crystal the crystal solidified.$(br)Since even a light touch is enough to give you a cold shiver, you called it Frostbite Crystal.
This is an interesting one. When Flowers absorb this magical liquid through their roots, they turn into those elusive plants.
